topic.title: HP Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Using the Database Service

body.p: The database service provides lifecycle services for MySQL, Redis, or MondoDB database instances. Lifecycle services include provisioning, configuration, patching, backups, restores, and monitoring that can be administered from either a CLI interface, RESTful APIs or the Horizon dashboard.
These instances can then be utilized by your applications to provide standard datastore/back-end functionality.
The following topics explain how to create and manage a database:
